gcci.text: With H100 leasing at $3.18/hr, capex for large fleets remains high as supply constraints keep GPU availability tight, forcing buyers to lock in long-term leases.

gtpi.text: At $1.25/1M input tokens, aggressive API pricing is compressing margins while models vie on efficiency, with inference cost becoming a primary battleground.

gagl.text: Annual load at 120 TWh raises grid strain concerns, with data center demand pushing energy sourcing toward low-carbon options and potential nuclear adoption.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment remains buoyant but bubble risks persist as capex and energy intensity grow faster than sustainable demand, questioning long-term growth viability.
